name: BR-Municipal Cementery
description:
In order to create the most immersive and satisfying gaming experience for as many players as possible, regardless of their gaming platform, we have created THE MUNICIPAL CEMETERY.
THE MUNICIPAL CEMETERY, consists of a tool that will be updated periodically, in order to provide developers with information to refine the performance of the part still under development.
Basically it is a kind of viewer so that any user who downloads and installs it for FREE can get an idea of how THE BRAMSON CASE will run on their system, offering in addition to the game experience. Of course, the RABBIT'S LAIR team has not created this scenario for the sole purpose of testing the final product.
Investigators and fans of Lovecraftian mythology, as well as fans of Gothic Horror will find, taking quiet and perhaps melancholic walks through our (your) graveyard, many important clues and riddles that maybe... and only maybe, will help them to unveil veiled parts of the plot that we have created for all of you

BR- Munucipal cementery for Googleplay:

BR-Municipal cementery - Aplicaciones en Google Play
